name: Robot Tale
description:
Once upon a time, a strange thing happened to a robot. He found a human being in a cryo-chamber. He decided to rescue him. Will the robot be able to keep the human alive?

The cryo-chamber needs energy cells and water. You should collect them, or you will loose. Avoid or destroy the enemy drones and find the evacuation ship.

Left Mouse Button = Move
Right Mouse Button = Shoot
